text: A Time for Love (, Na ge bu duo qing) is a 1970 Hong Kong Shaw Brothers comedy film directed by Kuei Chih-Hung. ==Cast== * Cheng Kwan-Min * * Shirley Huang * Lee Kwan * Ai Lien Pan * Dean Shek as Chau Ping * Wu Wei ==External links== * * Hong Kong Cinemagic entry Category:1970 films Category:Hong Kong films Category:1970 comedy films Category:Shaw Brothers Studio films Category:Hong Kong comedy films
title: A Time for Love (film)
